item.description:
You found me

in the deaths of

will to live

so close

and you told me

These are more than
just words
That I write
this is love
That we’re making
there ain’t
No mistaking
for you
I’ve been waiting
thank you for
Saving my life - - -
you came to me
Put your hand
in my hand
Salvation from
my demons within
Escape from
a definite end
When like you said
I could win
Then you showed me
what life should
Be like
cause I have you
But here by my side
you’re the reason
That I’m still alive
these are more than
Just words
that I write
This is love that
we’re making there
Ain’t no mistaking
for you
I’ve been waiting
thank you for saving
My life
this is the way

stay for now

of my life

ain’t no mistaking
